content.raw:
Having a blank visual element causes Gazebo to throw an exception, e.g.:

    <?xml version="1.0"?>
    <sdf version="1.3">
      <model name="Polaris Ranger EV">
        <link name="rear_right_wheel">
          <!--pose>2.5313 -4.1567 7.2207 0.0 0.0 0.0</pose-->
          <pose>0.0 0.0 0.25 0.0 0.0 0.0</pose>
          <inertial>
            <mass>0.5</mass>
          </inertial>
          <visual name="visual">
          </visual>
          <collision name="collision">
            <geometry>
              <cylinder>
                <radius>0.11</radius>
                <length>0.5</length>
              </cylinder>
            </geometry>
            <surface>
              <friction>
                <ode>
                  <mu>100000.0</mu>
                  <mu2>100000.0</mu2>
                  <slip1>0.0</slip1>
                  <slip2>0.0</slip2>
                </ode>
              </friction>
            </surface>
          </collision>
        </link>
        <link name="chassis">
          <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
          <visual name="visual">
            <geometry>
              <mesh>
                <uri>model://polaris_ranger_ev/meshes/polaris.dae</uri>
              </mesh>
            </geometry>
          </visual>
        </link>
      </model>
    </sdf>
content.html:
Having a blank visual element causes Gazebo to throw an exception, e.g.:

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<sdf version="1.3">
  <model name="Polaris Ranger EV">
    <link name="rear_right_wheel">
      <!--pose>2.5313 -4.1567 7.2207 0.0 0.0 0.0</pose-->
      <pose>0.0 0.0 0.25 0.0 0.0 0.0</pose>
      <inertial>
        <mass>0.5</mass>
      </inertial>
      <visual name="visual">
      </visual>
      <collision name="collision">
        <geometry>
          <cylinder>
            <radius>0.11</radius>
            <length>0.5</length>
          </cylinder>
        </geometry>
        <surface>
          <friction>
            <ode>
              <mu>100000.0</mu>
              <mu2>100000.0</mu2>
              <slip1>0.0</slip1>
              <slip2>0.0</slip2>
            </ode>
          </friction>
        </surface>
      </collision>
    </link>
    <link name="chassis">
      <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
      <visual name="visual">
        <geometry>
          <mesh>
            <uri>model://polaris_ranger_ev/meshes/polaris.dae</uri>
          </mesh>
        </geometry>
      </visual>
    </link>
  </model>
</sdf>
